mean_en: good at learning, understanding and thinking in a logical way about things; showing this ability; (of an animal, a being, etc.) able to understand and learn things
sentence: She can do very difficult math — what an intelligent girl!
sentence_trans: 她能解出非常难的数学题，真是个聪明的女孩儿！
word_etyma: intellig知识界 + ent表示具有……性质的 → intelligent智能型的，聪明的
